candidates.title: fix: use write_all and flush to ensure examples work
Use minimal buffer for label expansion
candidates.body:
Instead of a hardcoded 512 byte vector, use a buffer size appropriate for the actual CipherSuite instance.

I have made a few assumptions here but the 512 buffer was also an assumption, I assume :) If only I didn't need to use typenum here...

candidates.title: Allow splitting a connection into read/write parts
candidates.body:
There are two ways to split a connection:
 - using `std`, calling `.split()` will create a heap-allocated shared state object
 - calling `.split_with(state)` where users can pass a reference to a `SplitConnectionState` instance

candidates.title: feat: implement PSK support
candidates.body:
* Add support for configuring an external pre-shared key and applying it to the TLS handshake.
* Modify handshake to encode PSK binders for each identity configured by the configuration
* Refactor Clock and CERT_SIZE into a Verifier trait. This trait delegates certificate verification to an implementation, so that uses of PSK does not get the overhead of storing the certificates. Add a NoVerify for this case, and a webpki::CertVerifier using webpki.

Fixes #55

candidates.title: fix: expose alloc feature to allow RSA sig algs
feat: use new afit nightly feature
Fix builds using defmt
candidates.body: Builds using `defmt` will not compile because `TlsError::Io(embedded_io::ErrorKind)` does not implement `defmt::Format`.  This is a fix for that.

candidates.title: Update RustCrypto crates
candidates.body: Update all RustCrypto crates to the latest versions.

candidates.title: Refactor api
candidates.body: These changes are necessary for drogue device to support more than one TLS connection at a atime.

candidates.title: Update clap to 3.0.0-beta.5 in example/embassy
candidates.body:
This commit update clap in an attempt to fix the CI build which is
currently failing.

candidates.title: Add support for certificate validation and sending client certificate
Add support for blocking mode on rust stable
